mapper.select: select TOP(1)* from [celiangtubiao] where DateDiff(dd,avgcejieshijian,getdate())<=30 AND [avgtest_bench] ='CI4000 F1' AND [avgselectt] ='CRIN25L/C' ORDER BY [avgcejieshijian] DESC
